scripts.version:unix: npm version $npm_package_version --workspaces && (cd src/cli && npm version $npm_package_version) && git add .
scripts.version:windows: npm version %npm_package_version% --workspaces && cd src && cd cli && npm version %npm_package_version% && cd .. && cd .. && git add .
scripts.dryrun: (export TAGNAME=DRYRUN.$(date +%Y-%m-%d.%H.%M.%S); echo $TAGNAME >> .logs/dryruns.log && git add .logs/dryruns.log && git commit -m $TAGNAME && git tag -a $TAGNAME -m 'publish dry-run' && git push --follow-tags)
